summary: He is an economist, who holds a master degree in Finance. He has experience from the stock exchange, and worked for the Hungarian central clearing counterparty as a risk manager. After that he started working with startups as an investment manager, analyzed more than 50 seed stage companies and has worked with up to fifteen startups as a board member. He is a really communal person, strong to build his community and relationships. As Investment Director he is looking forward to investing in innovative technological startups, and helping to build their company with his business development experience. He is currently seeking new investment opportunities in the seed stage.
